tag.name: card

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Indicates the card state. Default: primary. Options: success, danger, info, default, primary
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be visible. Default : true
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Indicates the id for card component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardImage

attribute.description: It indicates if the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates if cardImage is responsive. Default : false
attribute.name: responsive

attribute.description: Indicates the height component
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Indicates the image width
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: It indicates the alt of image
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: It indicates the alt key (i18n) of image
attribute.name: altKey

attribute.description: It indicates if the component must be loaded from cdn
attribute.name: cdn

attribute.description: Indicates the image url
attribute.name: url

tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardTitle

attribute.description: Indicates the label
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n)
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardSubTitle

attribute.description: Indicates the label
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n)
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardText

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Indicates the label
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n)
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardHeader
tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardBody
tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardLink

attribute.description: Indicates the URL
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Indicates the label
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n)
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the target browser. Default: _self. Options: _self, _parent, _blank, iframen
attribute.name: target

tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>

tag.name: cardFooter
tag.example: <html:card> <html:cardImage url="/assets/image/person.png" width="32" height="32" responsive="false"></html:cardImage> <html:cardHeader> My header </html:cardHeader> <html:cardBody> <html:cardTitle>My title</html:cardTitle> <html:cardSubTitle>My subtitle</html:cardSubTitle> <html:cardText>My text</html:cardText> <html:cardLink label="My link 1" url="#"></html:cardLink> </html:cardBody> <html:cardFooter> My footer </html:cardFooter> </html:card>
